appDesc.message: Generate random passwords for password fields

passwordPatterns.description: Comma-separated list of common password field identifiers in English

enableHistoryDescription.message: Save generated passwords to local history

historyDisabledText.description: Text shown when history feature is disabled

rightClickTipText.message: Right-click on any password field and select 'Generate random password' to fill in a password

showAllText.description: Text for show all passwords button

hideAllText.description: Text for hide all passwords button

emptyHistoryText.description: Text shown when history is empty

veryStrongText.description: Text for very strong password strength

errorCharTypeRequired.message: Error: Please select at least one character type
errorCharTypeRequired.description: Error message when no character type is selected

errorTooManyExcluded.message: Error: Too many excluded characters, cannot generate password
errorTooManyExcluded.description: Error message when too many characters are excluded

confirmClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to clear all password history? This action cannot be undone.

allHistoryCleared.message: All password history has been cleared
allHistoryCleared.description: Message shown after clearing all history

noHistoryToExport.description: Message shown when trying to export empty history

moreRecordsText.description: Text for showing more records button

noPasswordFieldFound.message: No password field found. Please make sure the cursor is in a password field.
noPasswordFieldFound.description: Message shown when no password field is found

passwordGeneratedAndCopied.message: Password generated and copied to clipboard
passwordGeneratedAndCopied.description: Message shown when password is generated and copied successfully

passwordGeneratedCopyFailed.message: Password generated, but copy failed. Please copy manually.
passwordGeneratedCopyFailed.description: Message shown when password is generated but copying failed

clipboardOperationFailed.message: Password generated, but clipboard operation failed. Please copy manually.
clipboardOperationFailed.description: Message shown when clipboard operation fails

passwordSavedToHistory.description: Console log message when password is saved to history

passwordDuplicate.description: Console log message when duplicate password is skipped

passwordDuplicateUpdated.message: Updated timestamp of duplicate password and moved to top
passwordDuplicateUpdated.description: Console log message when duplicate password is updated

csvHeaderRow.description: Header row for CSV export file

contextMenuGeneratePassword.description: Context menu item for generating random password
